an7.85:2.1: 9. Samaṇavagga
an7.85:4.1: * “Sattannaṃ, bhikkhave, dhammānaṃ bhinnattā bhikkhu hoti.
an7.85:4.3: Sakkāyadiṭṭhi bhinnā hoti, vicikicchā bhinnā hoti, sīlabbataparāmāso bhinno hoti, rāgo bhinno hoti, doso bhinno hoti, moho bhinno hoti, māno bhinno hoti.
an7.85:4.4: Imesaṃ kho, bhikkhave, sattannaṃ dhammānaṃ bhinnattā bhikkhu hotī”ti.
